alert.note: Alert for Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:37AM CDT until May 06 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Butler County in south central Alabama... South central Monroe County in south central Alabama... Southwestern Crenshaw County in south central Alabama... Northeastern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Conecuh County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Covington County in south central Alabama... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 436 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Repton to 10 miles southeast of Excel to 8 miles east of I65 And AL 113 to 3 miles north of Flomaton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Andalusia, Evergreen, Georgiana, McKenzie, River Falls, Castleberry, Excel, Red Level, Repton, Heath, Gantt and I65 And US 84. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia; Monroe
